events.text: [color=#ffed29](I’ve seen a bunch of ABPs around town, but I’ve never actually been inside one.)
[color=#ffed29](Now that we’re at a turning point with [b]Remedium[/b], I think it’s the perfect time to finally treat myself.)
[shake rate=80.0 level=8 connected=6]WELCOME TO ALL BREAD PATISSERIE!!![/shake]

[color=#ffed29](What a welcome!)
[color=#ffed29](But, it’s kind of a lot for every time someone enters the cafe?)

See how you breathe with your gut?
And you speak it out with all of your chest!
[color=#ffed29](Wait, they're practicing?)
[color=#ffed29](Also, DANG! When that man slapped his chest, I could feel the vibrations from here!)

Boss, you have the biggest chest I have seen in all of humanity. 
If auditory output is measured by chest volume, you must therefore conclude that I cannot and can never match you.
Do not be intimidated!!!
I will hand all of my power to you, so you have our combined strength!
Come on, let’s try a welcome!
[shake rate=20.0 level=5 connected=2]WELCOME TO...ALL BREAD PATISSERIE.[/shake]

[color=#ffed29](It certainly was…something?)
[color=#ffed29](And I’ve never seen someone with gills before, I wonder where he’s from?)
See, Blight! Your words punch harder every day!
I do not understand how that is desirable.
“Rondeau, if you have a good idea—an idea you’ve thought about and you really believe in—it’s important that people hear [i]you[/i] speak that idea.”

Are you now in conversation with yourself?
This is very confusing. I thought verbal communication was mainly used interpersonally.  
Please do not switch between the two.

That’s a quote from my brother! 
And I believe the same for you, Blight! I want to make sure that people hear you!
I have had no complaints about the audio of my person.
And with continued practice, you never will!
Boss, I fear that if we keep this customer waiting, they will leave, and the very thin margins of profit we manage to obtain will diminish.

[i]HAHAHA!!  
Blight, we don’t have a profit margin!
I take pride in my calculations. Every quarter we break even!
[color=#ffed29](How is this place open???)
Hi, friend! Sorry for the delay!
The name’s Rondeau Impoli, and I’m the owner of All Bread Patisseries.
What’s your name? Are you new here?

I’m Orven, and I’ve been in Ventreville around a month?
But it’s my first time at an ABP.
Great to meet you!
Since you’re new, here’s a meal on the house!
Blight, give ’em… [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1][rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]"The Special."
[rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]“The Special?”
Close! But you gotta add more oomph to it!
[wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1][rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]"The Special."
[wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1][rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]"The Special."
Perfect!
The special has been labeled "Spicy Bread."
"Spicy Bread" is a bread with a spice of your choosing on it.
I see how it got its name?
It was a collaborative effort between the Boss and myself.
[color=#ffed29](Both of you?)
And it tastes…good?
I learned from the best, so it can’t not be good!

events.question: Please select from the designated list of spices to put on your bread. The selections change daily to promote returning customers.

events.text: Cinnamon?
The correct choice.
[color=#ffed29](The other choices were insane!!)
[color=#ffed29](Imma need some water after this.)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Cumin?
The savory choice.
[color=#ffed29](It’s still weird, but it’s not the dashi.)
[color=#ffed29](I’ve never put cumin on anything aside from meat.)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Paprika?
The red choice.

[color=#ffed29](I feel like with all of these, I can more-or-less guess what it’ll taste like.)
[color=#ffed29](They should definitely include a complimentary drink with this, though.)
I made the bread red.

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Salt?
The saltiest choice.
[color=#ffed29](I’d assume so???)
The worst choice.

The other options are just too crazy.
Please don’t put too much salt on, I don’t wanna burn my tongue.
There is a [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]mound of salt[/wave] on this bread.
[color=#ffed29](Oh no… I don’t wanna eat this. But it’s free…)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
Dashi?
My preferred choice.
[color=#ffed29](THE DASHI???)
[color=#ffed29](I’m coming in like a mortician, trying to figure out what the damage is for this monstrosity.)

[color=#ffed29](What the???)
[color=#ffed29](No way???)

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
[color=#ffed29](I finished the bread???)
Spicy Bread may rotate spice options, but the quality and satisfaction remain constant.
HOW???
Proprietary.

[color=#ffed29](What in Gramma’s kitchen happened to make a slice of white bread with a random spice and NOTHING ELSE taste good???)
[color=#ffed29](And that was surprisingly filling???)
[color=#ffed29](…Wait…)
[color=#ffed29](What’s wrong with me…why can’t I just take a good thing and leave it alone?)
Ah, sorry, didn’t mean to pry. It’s a good dish!
Please do not involve yourself with our super secretive inner workings.
[color=#ffed29](You!!! You’re intentionally baiting me! I won’t take it!)

I won’t, I won’t! I promise.
I used to have a bad habit about stuff like that, but…not anymore.

???
Why?

Why, like, why’d I stop being nosy?
I was causing trouble, getting cocky. You know, stuff like that.

The desire to understand is an inherent trait of humanoids.
Why would you forfeit it?

That’s…a nice way to think of it. But practically, you have to draw the line.
Sometimes there are just things bigger than you, you know? And you just gotta let those be.
Boss is bigger than me.
Significantly!
I am continually baffled by him, but I continue to experiment.
Experiment???
The more important the thing, the more important it is to know.
I do not agree with your mindlessness.
Hey, you were the one who told me to stop prying!
And that is enough to satiate yourself and your humanity?
DOES THAT MATTER?
This is disappointing.
Blight!
we’ll talk later.
I do not understand. I am trying to understand.

I know.
But there’s a time and place for things.
Can you go check on the bread for me?
I will leave because you desire that I go, as the bread has already been checked on.

I apologize if I caused you pain, Orven.
I do not apologize for criticizing your incorrect worldview.

I’m sorry, Orven.
I think Blight is trying to help you in his own way.

Listen, I’m not trying to start anything or get in any trouble.
What’s wrong with thinking that other people know better???
Nothing! I know that most people know more than me about most things.
But I think there’s a difference in how we’re going about things.
How so?

You just met Blight, but you’ve been eating for your whole life.
And also, do you cook?
Yeah, a decent bit.
There it is.
So you know food pretty well! Why would you take all that experience and knowledge you have and ignore it?
Just because a stranger told you to?
Then what’s the deal with the bread???
…Love.
It’s love. That’s why it tastes so good!
[color=#ffed29](There’s no way.)
You don’t believe me? It’s okay to say you don’t.
…but you guys [i]make[/i] the bread.
That’s true. So, you’ll have to decide for yourself if that’s enough for you.

I’m a pretty trusting guy, so it would be for me.
But you and Blight are curious people. You want to understand, and to know more fully.
That’s not a bad thing.
It feels like a bad thing.
Does it feel [i]bad[/i] or does it feel [i]difficult[/i]?
My brother used to say that, "there’s a difference between curiosity and cynicism; similarly, there’s a difference between trusting and not thinking."
He leaned cynical, and I leaned towards not thinking, [i]haha[/i]. We’ve all got our things.

But, sorry for the speech! I was just trying to help you see where Blight’s coming from.
He really means no harm.
For listening to us, here’s another [i]Spicy Bread[/i] on the house!

Thanks, man, I appreciate it. All of it.
I just think a lot of people wouldn’t agree with you.

And it’s important to think about [i]why[/i] they wouldn’t agree with me!
I think I’m right, but you might not, and that’s for you to decide.
That’s understanding, and if you understand, you can make better choices.
And I hope you understand Blight and me better and choose to come back to ABP!

[i]Haha[/i], I will, man.
Thanks, I appreciate you—Blight, too.

I’m glad to hear!
Take care, Orven.
Take care, Mr. Impoli!
Rondeau!
Take care, Mr. Rondeau!
[color=#ffed29](It feels difficult…But they make me feel bad.)
[color=#ffed29](I know it feels bad. People wouldn’t be that upset if it wasn’t bad.)
[color=#ffed29](Time to celebrate at my favorite cafe!)
Hey, everyone!
Orven!
Orven Zanry.
Rondeau! Blight!
No Tangeau tonight?
He came earlier!
You seem…different.
The word is happy!
That is NOT the word I am looking for.
What’s got you in such a good mood?
Delirious.

Rude!
And I think the Avidine Factory has gotten over a pretty big hurdle.
[rainbow freq=1.0 sat=0.8 val=0.8]Congrats!
Congratulatory words will be said if the hurdle is truly impressive.

Thanks!
Basically, we’ve been having a hard time with our current apothecaries...
And I can’t say too much, but I think that’s going to change very soon!
Because THEY’RE going to change very soon.
Ah, that sucks that your apothecaries didn’t work out.
Yeah, I don’t think we could see eye-to-eye.

Actually, a friend of mine was also having similar issues.
Except the opposite!
Yeah? You’re friends with an apothecary?

[i]Mhmm![/i] Brothers, in fact!
But they’re working with a new product and the production people just…won’t listen to them.
They keep submitting the same things, and leaving out the important stuff.
Babs and Throck are trying to reach out, but I dunno if the company is ignoring their suggestions or if the people there don’t care.
Dang, that’s frustrating.

events.question: Maybe they can do the review for your thing if you haven’t found one yet! They’re really good apothecaries.

events.text: That’d be awesome!

Their names are Babinksi and Throckmorton Jones, and they run the B&T Apotheca.
Really good guys, really care about what they do.
Thanks, man, I’m sure they’ll make great additions to the team!
If you enjoy horses.
Throck adores horses. You’ll see, he’s a ton of fun to talk to.
I’m looking forward to it!
I look forward to you purchasing food. It is always a lengthy process.
[i]Haha[/i], sorry, man.

events.question: Please choose from the menu the item that you wish to put in your mouth.

events.text: [color=#ffed29](I’m going to regret this. But I love cheese!)
What’s “Cheese Three Ways"?

It is Mac and Cheese, Grilled cheese, and Cheese and Broccoli soup.
Each item has three cheeses in them.
[color=#ffed29](Oh, I’m DEFINITELY going to regret this.)
The bathroom code is 0000.

How’d you know?
And that’s not much of a code…

I have consistently gotten the request for the bathroom code for this menu item.
So, I have taken the initiative to include it with the purchase to save time and effort.
The simple code is because of the urgency with which people need the bathroom.
[color=#ffed29](Oh boy.)

Babs, the apothecary I recommended to you, would probably recommend something to help with the dairy.
I’m pretty sure there’s like a pill or something to help.

When he explains it, I get kinda lost, though.
But basically, it gives you what you need to defeat the dairy.
Why invent a product that most humanoids are incapable of digesting?
[b]Because it’s delicious.
It really is good.
So, I’m excited to try this, and I’ll do you the favor of going home before I need the bathroom!

Human excrement does not phase me.
But it is preferable if you aim for the toilet.
Dude, I’m not [i]nasty.
Here the food you choose, but your intestines reject.
[i]Mmm!
It’s all pretty good! It’s a lot of cheese, though. Could use something to cut that fat.
Why would you criticize the cheese amount when you purchased the cheese?
[i]Haha[/i], you’re right. I asked for this.
Who doesn’t love cheese?
My butt won’t love it in a couple hours.
Seriously, if you stop by B&T Apotheca, they can whip something up for you.
Nah, I’m good. You just deal with it, you know?
Foolish.
Sometimes, people just wanna tough it out!

Thanks for the cheese!
I gotta go, but I’ll see you guys later!
Do not faint on the toilet.
Take care of yourself, Orven!
Who doesn’t love soup?
Today’s soup is ball soup.
Oh, so the soup isn’t in a bowl of bread.
You just put a small sourdough loaf in a bowl of soup…
An island in a sea of liquid chicken.

Broth, then.
[color=#ffed29](Well, time to try the sea of liquid chicken?)

Oh yeah, this is wedding soup.
It’s good! But like, normal good!

Normal is good.
“Be normal” is my prerogative.
Honestly, with what work has been telling me, it’s mine, too.
Mmm, these meatballs are decent. The chives are always nice.
Decent is my favorite compliment.
Not sure how much the bread adds?

I mean, now I got a wet sourdough…
Can I get it on the side next time?
No, then it would not be “Bread Soup.”
Oh, okay...
Are you not normal?
Before, you said that your goal is to be normal as well.

Oh, that.
Don’t worry about it. I’m just mumbling to myself.
Rondeau!
Yeah?
Why is the bread [i]in[/i] the soup?
Because it’s bread soup! Isn’t it cute?
But it’s all soggy…
If you eat it fast enough, it isn’t!
Rondeau inhales his food.
Ohhh, don’t give yourself a stomachache!
Food is good!
I get that.
About being normal—

Oh shoot, I gotta get back!
See you guys next time!
See you!
Perhaps, I do need to work on the audio of my person.

With your whole chest, Blight!
Don’t worry, you can ask next time.
I guess, I’ll get the salad?
It is mostly crouton.

You are at a store called, “All Bread Patisseries.”
The salad must also be bread.
Um…Okay.
I made sure the bread was stale before it was crouton.
I know that that’s how you’re supposed to do it, but “stale” isn’t really appetizing for most people.
You have already purchased the item, whether you perceive it as appetizing or not is no longer my concern.
What if I ask for my money back?
You won’t.
Yeah…I wouldn’t.
Enjoy.
[color=#ffed29](Wow, this really is a bowl of croutons with some salad nestled between them.)

WOW.
This is definitely the loudest meal I’ve ever eaten.
That was the goal!
It is an auditory and gustatory experience.
Wow, my jaw hurts.
A meal to strengthen musculature.
Another goal of the meal!
Wow, I’ve definitely never thought about food in those ways before.
Return for continued education.

Yeah! There are many more things to try on the menu.
Blight and I are always cooking up new ideas.
Baking up new ideas.

I look forward to it!
I’ll see you guys soon, thanks again for the apothecary recommendations!
Anytime! See you, Orven!
Purchase more food.
[i]Haha[/i], will do!
You return to the beating.
I’m here for the special, and I’m just going to enjoy it this time!
Your curiosity has been sated?
Resigned.
Disappointing.

events.question: Please select from the designated list of spices to put on your bread. The selections change daily to promote returning customers.

events.text: Does it even matter which spice I’ll pick?

A good question.
Do you want the answer?
No, I…I’m good. I'll take the Mint.
No, I…I’m good. I'll take the Parsley.
No, I…I’m good. I'll take the Chives.
No, I…I’m good. I'll take the Rosemary.
I hope it piques your interest.
Well, I know what the result will be anyways, the “how” doesn’t matter much, does it?
What happened to you in the time between our last encounter and now?
Your brain has drastically changed.
I guess you gotta grow?
This is regression.

No, it’s not??
Everyone at work is like this, and they’ve all been there a lot longer than me.
Your workplace makes me sad.
Why would you forfeit your innate desire for understanding?

What’s the point???
You’re not going to tell me the recipe, right?
I tell you it is bread and a spice of your choosing.

Right, so you’re not going to tell me what’s going on with it.
So, what’s the point in getting upset and thinking about it?
Because you know it’s not true.
So, what is it???
Bread and a spice of your choosing.
[i]ARGHH!
So you are still curious.

Here is your “Spicy Bread.”
Maybe this time you’ll crack it.
I doubt that…

!!!!!!
Somehow, [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]it’s better than I expected?
As expected.
I don’t get it.
Keep coming back until you do.
The secret is love.
DUDE.
[b]Never.
It SHOULD be love, BLIGHT!!
ONE DAY, the answer WILL be love! Continue eating!!!
Orven Zanry, the answer will never be love, continue searching.

…I will, [i]haha[/i], I will.
Thanks, guys.
Have a good night!
Return to guess again.

I will! I promise.
See you guys soon!

events.choice: I’ll get their info for Mr. Gungand and Miss Odiche!

events.text:
Thanks, man!
I’ll let Mr. Gungand and Miss Odiche know!
Gungand.
…That’s your manager?
Yeah, why?

Advocate for yourself.
Why do you believe your apothecaries are insufficient?

??????
Whoa, guys, do you know our apothecaries?

I know a lot of people in Ventreville, Orven.
But, can I ask why you aren’t seeing eye-to-eye with your apothecaries?

Come on, man, you can’t put me on trial like this after you’ve been talking with them.
Of course, they’re going to talk smack about us!
You are defensive.
Well, yeah, you guys suddenly stopped believing me!

Which is why I asked you to advocate for yourself.
I do not have sufficient data to conclude.
I want to hear your side, Orven.

Well, Mr. Gungand said that we’ve been denied three times, right?
And this doesn’t make sense unless someone has it out for us!
Continue.

I mean…what more is there to say?
We’ve all been doing our jobs the best we can, so the product should be fine!
Untrue, there are many reasons to deny the approval of public distribution of a medicinal or magical item.
Like biases!

None of which are biased.
Public safety must be stringent to prevent mass extermination.

We’re trying to SAVE people, not EXTERMINATE them???
What are you guys on?!

I…
Orven, do you know [i]why[/i] the product is being denied?
Like, did your managers tell you [i]exactly[/i] what the apothecary was requesting?

I…
I mean, I’m just a production worker, Rondeau.
I just blow the glass…I don’t even work [i]with[/i] the product itself.
Why should I know that information?
Everyone has a right to know what’s going on in a project they’re putting their time and effort into.
Do you even know who your apothecaries are?

events.question: Why do you give our “Spicy Bread” such scrutiny, but not your own products.

events.choice: Because your stuff doesn’t make sense!

events.text:
Because “Spicy Bread” is weird!
How can it be made of two ingredients and end up tasting like NEITHER ingredient???
What are the components of your product?
Uh, it’s mainly made of a component that Mr. Gungand found.
And what is that component?
…That’s proprietary!

Fair, but do [b]you[/b] know what it is?
Not the name, but what the actual component [b]is.

But that’s not for ME to know!
That’s for Mr. Gungand to figure it out, and I trust him!
Why shouldn’t I trust him???

For the same reason you shouldn’t trust your product.
You don’t know anything about either of them.

I know he’s my BOSS.
I trust HIM like you trust RONDEAU.
I do not trust Rondeau.
Hey!

Rondeau is clumsy, too trusting, and too caring.
He does not care to profit, only to have this cafe to continue indefinitely.
He cares more than anything for his nephew whose goal is to reveal as little about himself to others as possible, which is rendered difficult because his uncle reveals everything to everyone.
I’m trying not to! I have some things I keep to myself…

And still, I do not trust Rondeau entirely.
I still think for myself.
I still deny his ideas that I think are in poor taste or taste poorly.
And I’m grateful you do!

Can you describe your manager in more detail than I?
I have been very diligent with my observations.

Humanoids are interesting because they are interested in things.
To suppress this inherent desire is to dilute your humanity.
I did not take you as being tepid, Orven Zanry.
I’m NOT.
I just…don’t want any trouble.

Well, I get that, Orven.
Truly, I do.
Conflict and hardship are both scary…and you have to be strong to face them.

But I can’t defend when I’m a coward, you know?
And Tangeau and Blight will call me out when I’m being cowardly.
"UNCLE. Why won’t you tell me about what happened? What are you afraid of?"
"BOSS. You are correct, the customer is being belligerent. Do not reward this behavior."
You were going to give them a free meal for their harassment.
They were yelling at you, I wanted them to stop…

Words against you are not painful when you know you are correct.
I was unshaken.

And you’re great for that, Blight. Truly, you and Tangeau are [i]so[/i] strong.
So, Orven, I get wanting to live peacefully and make people happy.
But…I dunno, I just think Tangeau and Blight are cool, you know?
I want to be like them.

I believe in your humanity, Orven Zanry. 
Have a free “Spicy Bread” and think about your innate desire to understand.
Apply it.
The spice will be Mint. Distinct in flavor.

events.question: You know what it [i]should[/i] taste like.

events.text:
Thanks, Blight, appreciate it.
I’m sure it’ll be better than I expected.
It always is.

That’s a lot coming from Blight!
He always complains when I give away free food!
We do not profit. Profiting is the point of a business.
Not this one!
I do not understand.
[i]Haha[/i]!

But I hope you know we’re being hard because we care about you, Orven.
This isn’t about Babs or Throck. It’s about you.
Are those the apothecaries?

Babinski and Throckmorton Jones, yeah.
So, you really didn’t know them…
No…
Sorry, Orven.

No, no, I understand, Rondeau, don’t worry.
I appreciate you guys looking out for me. I just don’t know if I can be strong.

You [i]are[/i] strong, Orven.
When I see you, I see Tangeau and Blight.
Really? I dunno about that.
Incorrect assessment.
I swear! You got it in you, don’t worry.
Thanks, guys. Really, I’ll think about it.
I’ll see you guys soon.

See you, Orven!
Good luck with everything!
Return and order more food to compensate for all the free food you have received.
[i]Haha[/i], will do.

…I...
...I don’t want it, Blight.
Thanks, but no thanks.
You came here for food.
I’m not hungry anymore.
What do you gain by doing this?
I’m just tired, Blight.
This is disappointing.
I’m sorry.
I am the one that feels sorry for you.

It’s okay, Orven.
It sounds like it’s been stressful, and I’m sure there’s a lot of pressure for you to keep your head down at work.
But ABP will always be here! If you want a warm meal and some friendly faces, we’re here.

Thanks, man. I appreciate you both.
I just wanna be excited for our project, you know?

I know.
Well…I hope it’ll really save the city like everyone hopes it will.
It will.
Come back soon, okay, Orven?
Sure, man, have a good one.
See you!

events.choice: Because I have people above me to make those decisions!

events.text:
Because that’s not MY JOB???
Because people SMARTER than me and WHO HAVE BEEN THERE LONGER are in charge of that???
Their job is to think for you.

No, but it’s to think about the product and its safety?!
I just work in production. I just blow glass.
Is Orven Zanry only his job description?
…At my job, yes.

They request that you forsake your humanity?
A poor job.
They’ve been telling you to keep your head down at work?

I just…want to do my job well.
And that’s what they’ve told me is doing a good job.
Plus, I’m not being paid for that, you know?
There is a monetary value for your understanding?
No, no, it’s more like…thinking deeply about these things costs time and energy.
It always takes effort to understand.

events.question: You’re lucky! Rondeau is a cool and nice guy who cares what you think! Mr. Gungand isn’t like that.

events.choice: But Mr. Gungand does his job well.

events.text:
But, at the very least, Mr. Gungand does his job well.
I can trust him with that much.
Everyone at work is trying their best.
Why does he not communicate with or about the apothecaries then?
What?
Do you know your apothecaries associated with your project?
No...

This should not be proprietary to those working on the project.
Why do you not know them?

Do I NEED to?
Will that help me do a good job?
It will help you be a good Orven Zanry.
They don’t [i]want[/i] or [i]need[/i] a good Orven Zanry—they [i]need[/i] a good worker.

Your disregard for yourself is confusing.
Why is your workplace prioritized above your sense of self?
IT'S NOT! It’s…
It's...I just don’t want to get fired.

If I want to continue working on something I’m passionate about, if I want to work with Mister Avidine, if I want to eat and sleep in this city...
I NEED to be a good worker.
I don’t want to ruin a good thing.
You have a lot going on.
Yeah.
…This planet is broken. It's sad.
That’s life…
But there are good things, too.
Agreed.
I’m gonna go, guys. Thanks, though.
Wait, what about your meal?
I’m not hungry.
Please return and inquire about Spicy Bread.
[i]Haha[/i], sure.
Take care of yourself, Orven, and come back soon!
See you guys around.

events.choice: I wish Mr. Gungand were more like Rondeau.

events.text:
Of course I wish Mr. Gungand was okay with me asking questions and looking into things.
I wish it was encouraged that I be more than a “guy on production.”
But, if I push too much, I’m afraid of being fired…

Mr. Gungand does not sound fit for his position.
Who monitors him?
I think Mister Avidine?
I don’t know how he gets away with it…
Negligence. Why do you wish to continue to work there?
I mean, we’re doing good work, and I do really care about people being healthy.
That’s a great thing to care about!
There must be other means of accomplishing this.

I dunno…I also really owe Mister Avidine a lot.
He made this product that helped me a lot when I was younger.
Understood.
Can you tell Ret about this?
You call Mister Avidine by his first name?
Yeah, he was closer with Bongeau than me, though.

It’s always weird when you call Mister Avidine, “Ret.”
I don’t know if I’ve heard anyone else call him that.
Bongeau called him that, so I followed him!

But Ret’s a reasonable guy.
I feel like if you talk to him about it, he’ll hear you out.
Yeah…I think I just don’t wanna cause trouble.

Well, I get that, Orven.
Truly, I do.
Conflict and hardship are both scary…and you have to be strong to face them.
But I can’t defend when I’m a coward, you know? And Tangeau and Blight will call me out when I’m being cowardly.
"UNCLE. Why won’t you tell me about what happened? What are you afraid of?"
"BOSS. You are correct, the customer is being belligerent. Do not reward this behavior."
You were going to give them a free meal for their harassment.
They were yelling at you, I wanted them to stop…

Words against you are not painful when you know you are correct.
I was unshaken.

And you’re great for that, Blight. Truly, you and Tangeau are [i]so[/i] strong.
So, Orven, I get wanting to live peacefully and make people happy.
But…I dunno, I just think Tangeau and Blight are cool, you know?
I want to be like them.

I believe in your humanity, Orven Zanry. 
Have a free “Spicy Bread” and think about your innate desire to understand.
Apply it.

The spice will be Mint. Distinct in flavor.
You know what it [i]should[/i] taste like.

Thanks, Blight, appreciate it.
I’m sure it’ll be better than I expected.
It always is.

That’s a lot coming from Blight!
He always complains when I give away free food!
We do not profit. Profiting is the point of a business.
Not this one!
I do not understand.
[i]Haha!

But I hope you know we’re being hard because we care about you, Orven.
This isn’t about Babs or Throck. It’s about you.
Are those the apothecaries?

Babinski and Throckmorton Jones, yeah.
So, you really didn’t know them…
No…
Sorry, Orven.

No, no, I understand, Rondeau, don’t worry.
I appreciate you guys looking out for me. I just don’t know if I can be strong.

You [i]are[/i] strong.
When I see you, I see Tangeau and Blight.
Really? I dunno about that.
Incorrect assessment.
I swear! You got it in you, don’t worry.
Thanks, guys. Really, I’ll think about it.
I’ll see you guys soon.

See you, Orven!
Good luck with everything!
Return and order more food to compensate for all the free food you have received.
[i]Haha[/i], will do.
